# Commission

Commission

Tioga, ND 58852

Tioga, ND 58852

 

(p) (f)

**City Commission Board meets the first &amp; third Mondays of the month at 7pm City Hall.** 

**Tioga City is a Commission form of government**

- **The public is always welcome at Commission meetings.** During the public comment portion of the meeting, we ask you to limit your comments to 3 minutes.
- **If you wish to be on the agenda, please have your request to the City Auditor no later than 5:00 p.m. the Wednesday before each meeting. There are Agenda Submission Requests at the City Hall. After that time, your request will be placed on the following meeting agenda.**
- **To view City of Tioga Commission meeting videos, please visit the city's YouTube channel:**  [https://www.youtube.com/@cityoftioga](https://www.youtube.com/@cityoftioga)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Request for records forms can be mailed to City of Tioga PO Box 218 Tioga, ND 58852 or dropped off at City Hall Monday-Friday 8:00-5:00
